channel.title: [FoL] FoL 20 - Game Over - The Unseen Win!
channel.description:
# General Gameplay Information Host is Solic Co-host is Meteoro VC providers are Lightsin and Frostwolf103
## Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 9. Lets all have fun and play together! 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. 11. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
## Gameplay
* Days last 72 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread. * Recently added classes will *NOT* be forcibly rolled and are not guaranteed unless stated.
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
## [Feedback List ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082)
## Journals
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
## Rolelist **King** **(65% <font color="steblue">Good</font>, 35% <font color="purple">Evil</font> / <font color="darkred">Devout</font>)** <font color="purple">**Mastermind</font>/<font color="darkred">Cult Leader**</font> <font color="purple">**Assassin</font></font>/<font color="darkred">Random Cult**</font> <font color="steblue">**Prince**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> / <font color="grey">**Random Neutral Non-Killer**</font> <font color="grey">**Random Neutral Non-Killer**</font> <font color="grey">**Neutral Killer**</font>
## [Roles](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998)
## Playerlist 1. H_Hjasik :crown: 2. ~~Geyde~~ Priestess 3. ~~Alice~~ Killed Night 2, [color=solblue]**The Knight**[/color] 4. ~~Isaac_Gonzalez~~ Killed Night 2, [color=solblue]**The Maid**[/color] 5. EzrealOfLaw 6. ~~Kai_5~~ Killed Night 4, [color=solblue]**The Court Wizard**[/color] 7. Fireslol 8. ~~Possessed~~ Killed Night 1, [color=solblue]**The Drunk**[/color] 9. ~~DatBird~~ Lynched Day 4, [color=#CC0000]**The Devil**[/color] 10. Bazingaboy 11. Twilight 12. ~~Margaret~~ Killed Night 3, [color=solblue]**The Archer**[/color] 13. ~~PoisonedSquid~~ Killed Night 4, [color=solblue]**The Prince**[/color] 14. Moustashe 15. ~~Boss110~~ Lynched Day 3, [color=navy]**The Possessor**[/color] 16. ~~BlueStorm~~ Lynched Day 2, [color=purple]**The Assassin**[/color]
### Backups: 1. SweetyCake 2. Soulshade55r
### Spectators: 1. MathBlade 2. Insanity 3. Astand 4. Marcus_Doodalee

item.title: [FoL] FoL 20 - Game Over - The Unseen Win!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Archer’s Mark and Knight’s Guard also are very different powerwise. You can kill most NK’s through death immunity with Knight Guard, just not Possessor in most cases. You can bypass their defenses, by just lynching them or finding out they are death immune and then lynching them. Prince is supposed to deal with larger threats.

Read full topic

item.title: [FoL] FoL 20 - Game Over - The Unseen Win!
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
Solic:

You kept Unseen at their optimal KPN number for most of the time which is 2 and killed the NK early, who should actually start killing an unseen at the pace that the game was going.

With setup that was given to BD, they could easily won IF they actually cooperate with BD more often.

Read full topic
item.source: [FoL] FoL 20 - Game Over - The Unseen Win!

item.title: [FoL] FoL 20 - Game Over - The Unseen Win!
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
The Isaac and Marg kills were honestly just WTF. Marg killed a TR’d parity cop claim for no reason while Fireslol then killed Marg despite her getting a green check from Tw1.

Squid was meh-ish and should have played more aggressive.

Overall the BD Killers played very poorly, IMO. Plus, I got the worst BD Killer as I was the only one who couldn’t guess wrong because of the suicide penalty and I had no means to bypass the MM’s or NK’s death immunity.

IMO, the CS penalty should be nerfed in this case.

Read full topic
item.source: [FoL] FoL 20 - Game Over - The Unseen Win!

Finding BD is as important as finding scum.

Read full topic
